prompts.prompt: Try to generate different example each time.Ask a question about the concept of promises in javascript with a piece of code with a bug in it. Provide the hint in a poetic riddle form.
Try to generate different examples of code and poem each time.Create a program with an example of a common but complicated memory leak in python.
Generate a program to delete a node in a binary search tree in python with an error. Provide the hint in a poetic riddle
Create a program to demonstrate how yeild and generators can be used in python with an example and output/
Create a JavaScript program that mistakenly uses a global variable. Offer a riddle as a hint to find this scope-related bug.
Write a Python script with an infinite loop. Present a poetic hint about the cause of the endless repetition.
Design a C++ program with a pointer mismanagement bug. Provide a cryptic poem that hints at the dangling pointer issue.
Create a Java program with a concurrency issue. Offer a poetic riddle hinting at the race condition in the code.
Compose a Python program that improperly handles exceptions. Provide a poem as a hint to the overlooked error handling.
Write a Ruby script that has a bug related to variable shadowing. Give a poetic hint to uncover the shadowed variable.
